meanings.definition: Designed to reduce or minimize the possibility of an allergic response.
meanings.sent1: The hypoallergenic lotion is gentle on sensitive skin.
meanings.sent2: She chose hypoallergenic makeup to avoid any skin irritation.
meanings.sent3: The hypoallergenic cat made sure not to trigger anyone's allergies.
meanings.sent4: His hypoallergenic pillow was like a cloud for his head.
meanings.sent5: The hypoallergenic detergent kept her clothes fresh without causing any reactions.

meanings.definition: Not likely to cause an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent1: The hypoallergenic detergent is safe for everyone to use.
meanings.sent2: They bought hypoallergenic bedding to prevent any allergies.
meanings.sent3: The hypoallergenic dog was a hit at the allergy-friendly party.
meanings.sent4: Her hypoallergenic perfume was a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The hypoallergenic plants brightened up the room without any sneezing fits.
